task.title: How to Set up a DJ Presentation
task.shortdesc: These instruction will show you how to set up a DJ presentation with perfect sound reverberation in one of the AirClassrooms

taskbody.prereq:
Rent the Sound System set or pieces of it from the receptionist if you do not have one or more of the items required
2 HD Stereos and their Stands
1 Table
2 Audio Jacks
1 Chalkboard (comes with classroom)
1 Mircophone
1 Disco Ball with Tape(Optional)
1 Set of Party Lights with Tape (Optional)
1 Turntable
1 Turntable USB Cord (comes attached to turntable)
1 Laptop

step.cmd: Set up the stereos on their stands
Put the stereos next to the table in the front of the room, one on each side
Put your turntable onto the one of the table's provided
Plug in your turntable to a socket
Place your laptop on the table and turn it on
Plug in the mircophone to the computer
Plug the audio jacks into the stereos
Plug the other end of the audio jack into the laptop
(Optional) Hang up the disco ball with tape on the chalkboard behind you
(Optional) Hang up the party lights near the disco on the top side of the chalkboard behind you
